701672f-a.title: Bronx: Pulaski Park.
701672f-a.text:
Pulaski Park (Bronx):  A view eastward across the park from the Bronx and of the Willis Ave. bridge.  On the extreme left is visible East 133rd Street, and on the right the approach to the bridge.  The 3-story building within the park is that of the Board of Health.

P. L. Sperr.          May 7, 1937.
